subtitle:
"MAKE YOUR DREAM GARAGE."
The first in the GSR Car series is Le Man's ultimate GT machine!
description: Pre-orders will be taken at Tokimeki Mall and Circle K Sunkus stores from 9AM on 8th August 2009. On the 18th of August they will be announced to the general public.

The Shelby GT500 is a special Mustang produced by Shelby America and Carroll Shelby himself - a man who has had a huge impact on automotive racing and design over his lifetime. This mini-car is a model of the Road Going GT that obtained victory in the 24 Hours of Le Mans race - a higher grade version of the GT500 that was built between the official GT350 and GT500 models.

In comparison to the original Mustang, the GT500 has a much more dynamic design. It has a noticeably more aerodynamic front, as well as a new, original hood and duck-tail construction around the rear engine also leaves a strong impression on anyone who lays eyes on the vehicle. The "Le Mans" stripes over the body and raised light on the bonnet are also a show that this is no ordinary car.

Equipped with a 428 cubic-inch Police Interceptor engine, and with a 428 cubic-inch Cobra Jet V8 rated at 335 horsepower which it inherited from the Ford GT40 before it - however, due to it's different engine, the GT500 was still considerably different to the GT40. The torque it could create from the low level of revolutions in the engine, allowed for a much more comfortable and controllable ride. Currently, the new model of the GT500 is still able to boast excellent performance - including cruise control for today's busy roads. The new model also comes with the choice of a 4-speed manual, or 3-speed automatic transmission.
The final 'true' Shelby model

The GT500 model was manufactured at the Shelby America factory on the west coast. As the 1968 model was actually manufactured by Ford, the 'true' last Shelby was the 1967 model. The Shelby GT500 is the American model of superior, powerful driving. It was created with a chassis fine-tuned to race on any racing circuit, with rear tires always equipped with LSDs, and adjustable shock absorbers. Even the gear box was faster handling than the standard Mustang. It was a car that boasted performance, style, and a wonderfully unique appearance. Additionally, the car became famous when it debuted as 'Eleanor' in the movie 'Gone in Sixty Seconds', starring Nicolas Cage.

The GSR American Muscle series is here to release high quality models of a number of the most famous American cars. Coming up in the line up is the 1970 Dodge Challenger, the 1969 Chevrolet Corvette, the 1965 Shelby AC Cobra 427, the 1971 Mustang Mach 1, the 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Z28 and many more to look forward to.
name: GSR Cars: American Muscle Series 01 - 1967 Shelby GT500 (GSRかーず・あめりかんまっする・しりーず01／1967しぇるびーGT500)
copyright:
© "SHELBY(R) GT-500(R) are registered trademarks and/or intellectual property of Carroll Shelby and Carroll Shelby Licensing Inc. and are used under license."
SHELBY(R) GT-500(R)

subtitle: The Legendary Shelby with an incredible top speed of 272km/h!
description: Pre-orders will be taken at Tokimeki Mall and Circle K Sunkus stores from 9AM on 8th August 2009.

This is one legendary vehicle that should excite anyone in the racing field - the 'Super Snake' is a special model of the GT500 that was unparalleled. Loaded with the 7.0 LC (427ci) engine unit used on the Ford GT40 Mk.II developed by Le Mans, it is a perfect racing replica. The Super Snake was announced at a test course with a large media presence, where Caroll Shelby himself raced the car to it's top speed of 170 mph (272km/h), with an average speed of 142mph (227km/h), and created a day to remember for all racing fans.

Using a narrow-wide-narrow white stripe pattern, 10-spoke aluminum wheels, lights on both sides of the bonnet, and the well known 'Wimbledon White' body color, the external appearance of the Super Snake is not all that different to the original GT500, but the small changes alone are enough to recognize the famous car for what it is - the car that showed the world the potential the GT500 held. Only one Super Snake was ever produced, making it a vehicle that can boast both power and rarity; and a gem in both Shelby and American car history.

The GSR American Muscle series is here to release high quality models of a number of the most famous American cars. Coming up in the line up is the 1970 Dodge Challenger, the 1969 Chevrolet Corvette, the 1965 Shelby AC Cobra 427, the 1971 Mustang Mach 1, the 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Z28 and many more to look forward to.
name: 1967 Shelby Super Snake (Circle K Sunkus Limited Edition Model) (1967しぇるびー・すーぱーすねーく（さーくるけーさんくすげんていもでる）)
copyright:

description: From the popular anime currently being broadcast on NicoNico Anime Channel, 'Candy Boy', comes PVC figures of both of the Sakurai twin sisters. Candy Boy is well known for its high quality production, and these figures have been sculpted to match up to that quality!

The elder of the twins, Yukino Sakurai, is a gentle yet slightly clumsy girl. She has been posed with her light, long hair flowing behind her creating a very feminine pose. A replaceable arm part is included to display her holding hands with her older sister, Kanade Sakurai, allowing you to display just how close the two sisters really are!
name: Yukino Sakurai (さくらいゆきの)
copyright: © DREAMUSIC Inc./2008Candyboy PROJECT

subtitle: The battle of the logic in super-cute miniature form!
description: Finally a new set of figures is here to join the Nendoroid Petite series - and this time it's the characters from 'Death Note'.

The first set of figures called 'Case File #01' features the main character Light Yagami, as well as L, Misa Amane, the death gods Ryuk and Rem and even Watari, L's loyal assistant. Each character includes certain items that featured in the original story, allowing multiple scenes from the anime or manga to be recreated in miniature form!
The second set, 'Case File #02' is currently in production!
name: Nendoroid Petite: Death Note - Case File #01 (ですのーと けーすふぁいる #01 ねんどろいどぷち)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ.Ｎ.ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: The Demon King's loving wife.
description: From the popular game which recently made its way into a anime, 'Tears to Tiara', comes a nendoroid of the kind-hearted missionary, Riannon.
With parts that allow poses ranging from her cute lady-like smile to a fantastic battle scene of her casting a spell - various scenes from the show can be recreated in Nendoroid form!

Her large hat connects using a magnet, so the shape of her head was not altered by the shape of the hat. An expression with spinning eyes that was not seen in the original show is also included, allowing for some extra fun. How you choose to display her is up to your imagination!
name: Nendoroid Riannon (りあんのん ねんどろいど)
copyright: © AQUAPLUS/T3WORKS

subtitle: The notorious delinquent.
description: From the tactical RPG franchise's new release 'Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice' comes a cute Nendoroid of Raspberyl.

The character designer of the series, Takehito Harada, has a very distinct feeling to his character designs, and this Nendoroid of Raspberyl carries that feeling perfectly. Three separate face parts are included, and various memorable items from the game (glasses, meat, book) are all included as extras.
name: Nendoroid Raspberyl (らずべりる ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 2008 NIPPON ICHI SOFTWARE INC.

subtitle: figma Tsukasa is back, just as cute wearing her summer clothes
description: Joining the Lucky Star figma collection comes the summer version of the younger Hiiragi sister.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Various hand parts are included, also with all new hands such as a hand for holding items and a 'thumbs-up' hand.
Three face parts are included, including a smiling face, a crying face, as well a blank face with stickers, allowing you to make your own expression.
Also included are head parts for Hiyori Tamura, and Tsukasa's school bag.
As always, all the face parts can be used with all the previous Lucky Star figmas.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tsukasa Hiiragi: Summer Uniform ver. ( ふぃぐま ひいらぎつかさ なつふくver.)
copyright: © 美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: figma Billy Herington, perfect posing of a dashing body.
description: Now available for pre-order from NicoNico Chyokuhan! (http:niconico.qt.shopserve.jp/)

That body... that appearance... they truly are mystical. The well-known idol from NicoNico Douga, the "underwear wresting aniki", Billy Herrington is back again as a figma, this time around wearing a Halloween costume!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various wrestling scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for his breast muscles and biceps, allowing the proportions of his beautiful body to be kept, without compromising the posability.
Still the only figma to have shown his bare body, allowing for even more thriving poses!

His underwear is identical to that which appeared in his videos, and there are two variations to switch between - the wrestling pants and the ones worn underneath them. A skin-colored pair is also included for an even more naked appearance.
A shower-room paper craft is also included.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Billy Herrington: Halloween ver. ( ふぃぐま びりー・へりんとん はろうぃんver.)
copyright: © Billy Herrington

subtitle: Her adorable twin-tails fluttering around her summer uniform.
description: From the popular anime 'Lucky Star' comes the summer version figma of the older, reliable sister of the Hiiragi twins, Kagami!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Various hand parts are included, also with all new hands such as a hand for holding items and a 'thumbs-up' hand.
Three face parts are included, including a smiling face, an angry face perfect for Kagami, as well a blank face with stickers, allowing you to make your own expression.
Head parts for her classmate Misao Kusakabe are also included.
As always, all the face parts can be used with all the previous Lucky Star figmas.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kagami Hiiragi: Summer Uniform ver. ( ふぃぐま ひいらぎかがみ なつふくver.)
copyright: ©  美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: An all new '09 version of Miku decals!
description: Miku Hatsune is featuring in the GSR Character Customize Series once again! Now not only can you recreate the appearance of the famous GT Car - you can also place the cute images of the Nendoroid, and Petite Nendoroid images of Miku wherever you need a little extra! Decorate your model cars in the most adorable, colorful way possible!
These new seals have been made using an easier-to-apply material, making it even simpler to decorate than before!
name: GSR Character Customize Decals 07: Miku Hatsune '09 ver. - 1/24th scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる07／はつねみく'09ver)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. © Advancestep. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A sticker set that can recreate the GT Machine perfectly!
description: A brand new design of Miku Hatsune stickers is joining the GSR Character Customize Series, aiming to let anyone redecorate model cars in the most wonderful ways possible!

Now not only can you recreate the appearance of the famous GT Car - you can also place the cute images of the Nendoroid, and Petite Nendoroid images of Miku wherever you need a little extra! You can put them on anything close by, allowing yourself to feel closer to Miku all the time!
The decals make use of a high quality material, that does not allow the colors to fade easily and are also made to fit onto curved surfaces without difficulty. Made in Japan.
name: GSR Character Customize Stickers 04: Miku Hatsune '09 ver. - 1/10th scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーる04／はつねみく'09ver)
copyright: © Crypton Future Media, Inc. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. © Advancestep. All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: The resale that was long-awaited by all, except mankind.
description: From "Fireball", the first ever original Disney animation to have it's debut release in Japan, comes a figma of the noble robot, Drössel.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
The two different fashion units that featured in the show are both included, and can be switched at any time.
The flight unit, Obruchev is also included, allowing you to recreate Drössel's flight scenes.
Various hand parts are included, and the memory device left to her by her father, the PROSPERO book, is also included.
Her distinctive ocean blue eyes are sculpted using a clear plastic for a more realistic effect.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Drössel (どろっせる ふぃぐま)
copyright: © Disney

subtitle: figma Miyuki is back, just as lovely wearing her summer clothes
description: The third figure to join the Summer version Lucky Star figmas is the beautiful yet clumsy Miyuki Takara.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Various hand parts are included, also with all new hands such as a hand for holding items and a 'thumbs-up' hand.
Three face parts are included, including a smiling face, a troubled face, as well a blank face with stickers, allowing you to make your own expression.
Also included are head parts for Minami Iwasaki, the mysterious cat-like creature 'Nyamo' and Miyuki's glasses.
As always, all the face parts can be used with all the previous Lucky Star figmas.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Miyuki Takara: Summer Uniform ver. ( ふぃぐま たからみゆき なつふくver.)
copyright: ©  美水かがみ/らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: huke and Ordet are expanding the world of BLACK ROCK SHOOTER.
description: A pilot version of the anime adaption of BLACK ROCK SHOOTER, established by the meeting of the original illustrator huke and Ordet staff, is on its way to your screens!

The pilot DVD will be released with the new CD produced by ryo, 'Miku Hatsune voice-B', and will also come with an image board booklet. The CD will also be a special edition produced just for the project announcement.
Media Contents

(DVD/BD) BLACK ROCK SHOOTER - Pilot Animation -(original/Instrumental) BLACK ROCK SHOOTER - Pilot Animation -(2M MIX/Miku Hatsune voice-β) BLACK ROCK SHOOTER - Pilot Animation -(2M MIX/Instrumental) (CD) M-1. BLACK ROCK SHOOTER 2M MIX M-2. BLACK ROCK SHOOTER 2M MIX -Instrumental-
name: BLACK ROCK SHOOTER -PILOT Edition- (ぶらっくろっくしゅーたー ぱいろっとえでぃしょん)
copyright: © huke / B★RS Project　　　※画像はジャケットイメージとなります。

subtitle: A small body, but a huge scale!
description: The long awaited ending of the OVA series 'Kodomo no Jikan: 2nd Semester' releases on the 24th of July, and to commemorate comes a figure of the adorable girl who is helplessly in love with Rin, Kuro Kagami - also here in her gym uniform.

The uniform is once again made of real fabric, giving a realistic feeling to the figure. Her long, beautiful black hair flows down onto the ground as she sits posed on the ground, with her childish expression masking her composed personality.
Mimi Usa is also planned for release shortly, so you will be able to display all the girls together!
name: Kuro Kagami: Gym Uniform ver. (かがみくろ たいそうふくばーじょん)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル/こじか製作委員会

subtitle: I'm not cute!
description: Recently broadcast on Niconico Douga, TV Kanagawa and Kids Station, and with a second series on the way, 'Tentai Senshi Sunred' is a comedy anime holds large popularity with the people of Kanagawa City and the users of Niconico Douga. Usakottsu, the mysterious stuffed bunny and part of the evil organization Florsheim, and is on his way to becoming a Nendoroid!

His arms can be replaced to recreate his ultimate move, 'Demon Claw', as well as hold various items from the show. His legs can also be replaced to place him in a sitting position. Stickers of sweat drops are included to help recreate your favorite scenes from the show!
name: Nendoroid Usakottsu (うさこっつ ねんどろいど)
copyright: ©　くぼたまこと / スクウェアエニックス・フライングドッグ

subtitle: Seven circular charms using seven different colors.♪
description: The 'Manmaru Hachune' charm collection based on 'Character Vocal Series 01: Miku Hatsune' was originally only sold at events, but is now back with three new designs - adding up to a total of seven designs and ready to be released all over!

Each charm is a perfectly rounded circle, but each type has a different expression for you to pick which suits you. Pick just one that suits your mood, or display them all together - the choice is up to you!
*This is a package of all seven charms in a box, however the box is not shown in the product images.
name: Character Charm Collection: Manmaru Hachune - Doremifasolati Set (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん まんまるはちゅね どれみふぁそらしせっと)
copyright: © おんたま／Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: The small and cute, albeit slightly strange characters
description: Currently being serialized in Dengeki Daimaou is a spin-off to the popular IDOLM@STER series called 'Puchimasu', or 'PETIT IDOLM@STER' - and from that series comes these rubber charms of the mysterious, yet cute characters from the series.

Each character is represented exactly how they would appear in a pose that relates to each of them, and each has a speech-bubble exclaiming their characteristic shouts. It allows you to be with your favorite character from the series all the time.
The characters not released in Stage 01, are all planned to be included in the Stage 02. Collect them all and enjoy the mysterious life behind the bizarre creatures.
name: PETIT IDOLM@STER - Trading Rubber Charms: Stage 01 (とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ ぷちます！すてーじ01)
copyright: © 窪岡俊之 © NBGI　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: The second Guardian Knight. The Healing Wind.
description: Following Signum from 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS' comes a figma of one of the Wolkenritter leaders, Shamal.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used around moveable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Two gentle expressions that represent Shamal's affectionate personality are included.
"The Blessed Wind" Reinforce Zwei is included at the same scale as the figmas.
Additional parts for "Hayate Yagami: Knight Armour ver. " are included to recreate the union between Reinforce and Hayate.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Shamal: Knight ver. (ふぃぐま しゃまる きしふくver. )
copyright: © なのはStrikerS PROJECT © NANOHA StrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: Expand more; play more - The first expansion set is for differences in height and mobility.
description: In order to increase the enjoyment of the figma action figure series, this new generation display unit known as the 'di:stage' has been created. Combining this expansion set with the basic set allows various new ways for the di:stage to expand!. This 'Layer Unit' expansion set allows for a multilateral display area to be created, and will be sold together with the basic set. [ul]
features: Using the pillar supports allows you to display figures at various heights.
A 'swing joint' can be used to create a multilateral display space by connecting two bases that share the same raised point.
Combine it with the Basic Set and create your very own diplay space!
name: di:stage: Expansion Set 01: Layer Unit Black ver. (でぃすてーじ えくすてんしょんせっと01 れいやーゆにっと ぶらっくばーじょん)
copyright: © MAXFACTORY・MASAKI APSY

subtitle: Expand more; play more - the new generation display base 'di:stage' is back with an alternate 'Clear' version.
description: In order to increase the enjoyment of the figma action figure series, this new generation display unit known as the 'di:stage' has been created. It will soon expand into a series with nearly infinite possibilities, but this is the basic foundation set.
** The examples of the built set in the included images includes multiple basic sets. ** The actual figma models, as well as speech bubbles are not included with this product.
features: The base unit is a 10cm square, and the perfect way to display two figmas together.
Multiple base units can be connected horizontally via flat joints, or vertically via wall joints, allowing the stage to expand however you want it to.
A grappling unit that can be used to hold virtually any action figure is included.
Effect clips can be used to hold speech bubbles and show emotions of the characters.

Using the 'binders' that can be attached to all sides of the base, you can create a background using paper vignettes, or cover the base with a cover skin. This allows you to recreate various situations to enjoy. Paper vignettes and cover skins will be available for download online, and are planned to be available in magazines.
You can combine this with future extention sets to create your very own scenarios.
name: di:stage: Basic Set Clear ver. (でぃすてーじ べーしっくせっと くりあばーじょん)
copyright: © MAXFACTORY・MASAKI APSY

subtitle: The "Sword Cross" wielded by the last king of the night sky.
description: The second in the Lyrical Nanoha metal charm series, Hayate Yagami's staff, the Schwertkreuz, is rendered here in exquisite detail. The complexity of the unique staff's cross-shaped head remains intact, as does the design of the included magic circle, making it the perfect addition to any fan's collection.
name: Device Metal Charm Collection 02 - Schwertkreuz (しゅべるとくろいつ でばいすめたるちゃーむ これくしょん)
copyright: ©なのはStrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: Expand more; play more - A clear version of the first expansion set, for differences in height and mobility.
description: In order to increase the enjoyment of the figma action figure series, this new generation display unit known as the 'di:stage' has been created. Combining this expansion set with the basic set allows various new ways for the di:stage to expand!. This 'Layer Unit' expansion set allows for a multilateral display area to be created, and will be sold together with the basic set. [ul]
features: Using the pillar parts you can create differences in height allowing you to display figures at various heights.
A 'swing joint' can be used to create a multilateral display space by connecting two bases that share the same raised point.
Combine it with the Basic Set and create your very own diplay space!
name: di:stage: Expansion Set 01: Layer Unit Clear ver. (でぃすてーじ えくすてんしょんせっと01 れいやーゆにっと くりあばーじょん)
copyright: © MAXFACTORY・MASAKI APSY

subtitle: Seven circular charms using seven different colors.♪
description: The 'Manmaru Hachune' charm collection based on 'Character Vocal Series 01: Miku Hatsune' was originally only sold at events, but is now back with three new designs - adding up to a total of seven designs and ready to be released all over!

Each charm is a perfectly rounded circle, but each type has a different expression for you to pick which suits you. Pick just one that suits your mood, or display them all together - the choice is up to you!
Each of the versions (do, re, mi, fa, sol, ra and ti) are each sold separately.
name: Character Charm Collection: Manmaru Hachune (きゃらくたーちゃーむこれくしょん まんまるはちゅね)
copyright: © おんたま／Crypton Future Media, Inc.

subtitle: The reborn who kepps the Sacred God's name close by.
description: From 'Seinarukana' the second chapter in the popular PC game series 'Eien Shinken Monogatari' comes a PVC figure of the game's heroine, Satsuki Ikaruga. The figure was originally designed as a garage kit by the popular sculpting group Cerberus Project, but is now being released as a finished product by Lilics.

With a charming, yet focused expression, she stands gallantly brandishing her Eternity Sword, 'Kougi', just as a true leader should appear before her followers. Her flowing hair and costume sway graciously in the wind, as she strikes down her enemies in the heat of battle.
name: Satsuki Ikaruga (いかるがさつき)
copyright: © 2007 XUSE

subtitle: Piling up the enemies as they fall by her hand.
description: From the popular PC Game 'Koihime Musou' that has recently had its second anime series announced, comes a PVC figure of Kanu, the warrior who fights to defend the safety of the public.

Holding her favorite weapon, 'Seiryuu Engetsudou' in one hand, she has been posed in a vibrant, dynamic pose, as if she was attacking an enemy camp. Her serious and loyal personality is displayed through her gallant facial expression, as her long black hair flows behind her.
She comes complete with a base of flames, creating a figure that is definitely a sight to behold.
name: Aisha Kanu (かんう あいしゃ)
copyright: © BaseSon

subtitle: Nanoha's lovely staff, which starts the story off!
description: With its pulse-pounding action and lovable characters, Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS has made quite a name for itself, and now the faithful Raising Heart Excelion, which has fought with Nanoha from the very beginning, makes an appearance as a metallic charm courtesy of Good Smile. In its combat-ready Buster Mode, the staff contains a transparent rhinestone at its centre, includes a detailed rendition of Nanoha's magic seal, and is perfect either to wear or to display. Certainly, any Nanoha fan will drool at the prospect of owning this wonderful charm.
name: Metal Device Charm Collection 01: Raising Heart Excelion (でばいすちゃーむ これくしょん 01 れいじんぐはーとえくせりおん ばすたーもーど)
copyright: © なのはSｔrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: The naïve king of the three kingdoms. figma Sonsaku Hakufu!
description: From Ikkitousen Great Guardians comes a figma of the leader of Nanyang Academy - Sonsaku Hakufu in her school uniform.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used around the shoulders and skirt, as well as parts of the hair, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Replaceable clothes allow you to recreate Sonaku as if she was in a battle, wearing a ripped uniform.
A shouting face, as well as an expression as if she was possessed by the dragon that sleeps within her are both included, giving a total of 3 expressions.
There are five replaceable hand parts for both the left and right hands, including hand-to-hand combat hands suited perfectly to Sonsaku.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Sonsaku Hakufu (そんさくはくふ ふぃぐま)
copyright: © 2008 YUJI SHIOZAKI・WANI BOOKS/IKKITOUSEN GG PARTNERS

subtitle: The reborn Otoha Karas!
description: From the 40 year commemoration anime from Tatsunoko Production, 'Karas' comes a limited edition PVC figure of Otoha Karas in his 'Regenerated Karas' form. The figure has been brought to life by the popular sculptor Kenji Andou, who was also responsible for the character designs for many of the monsters as well as Eko Karas in the series!

Using a soft material for the bulk of the figure allows it to keep to it's true design, whilst still creating a great action figure that can easily pose in a number of ways. Multiple hand replacements are also included, along with his sword both before and after it's change, allowing for even more scenes from the show to become a reality!
name: S.O.G MAX Otoha Karas: Regenerate Ver. (えす おー じー まっくす おとはからす りじぇねらーとばーじょん)
copyright: © タツノコプロ／鴉 -KARAS- 製作委員会

subtitle: Hawk One, take off!
description: From the classic Ultra Seven anime series comes an EX Alloy model of the Ultra Hawk Number One - the aircraft developed in the Ultra Garrison's East Base to be their most powerful military weapon.

Sculpted by the popular Shouichi Manabe, this model's wings span an impressive 38cm, and the main body as well as the wings have been sculpted via die casting, giving the model both a realistic feel and a realistic weight. All three parts of the aircraft, the α,β and γ parts can be connected and separated via magnets, and each has their own stand, allowing you to display them in Formation Attack mode as well.
name: EX Alloy: Ultra Hawk Number One (えくすごうきん うるとらほーくいちごう)
copyright: © 1967 円谷プロ

subtitle: The dark watchmen, Karas!!
description: From Tatsunoko Production's 40 year aniversary OVA 'Karas', comes a figure of the main character from the show, 'Otoha Karas', who threw away his individuality to protect the city. The design of the figure has been created by the popular designer of the Eko Karas, Kenji Ando.

Flexible materials have been used all over the body, creating a very poseable action figure that never loses its style. The Karas sword in both its original version and expanded version are inlcluded, as well as exchangeable face parts and an abundance of replaceable hand parts.
The ability to recreate scenes from the anime has never been this easy!
name: S.O.G. Max Otoha Karas (えす おー じー まっくす おとはからす)
copyright: © タツノコプロ／鴉 -KARAS- 製作委員会

subtitle: Military cosplay from the Sengoku era!
description: The miniature charm sets that are even smaller than the normal Nendoroid Petite figures are back in animate and Gamers stores again! A separate set of each of the three heroines of Lucky Star will each be sold in various areas around Japan - each cosplaying famous commanders from that area.

Wearing the characteristic armor or clothing of various different commanders, the Lucky Star girls make a total of 18 mascots, and each of these mascots are sold as both a netsuke and a miniature charm.
Additionally, an extra charm of Miyuki Takara is included in the full set available through mail order.
name: Nendoroid PLUS: Lucky Star Cosplay Charm Series 2 (らきすた こすぷれねづけ＆ちゃーむだい２だん ねんどろいどぷらす)
copyright: © 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: The most ferocious mad scientist around!
description: From flash animator FROGMAN's masterpiece work "Eagle Talon", comes a Nendoroid of the scientist from Edo Tokyo, Professor Leonardo. His face and arm parts can be replaced to recreate his signature pose "Falcon Claw!"
His favorite foods: honey, fish and pizza are all included as optional extras, and various parts of the figure are poseable - so strike a pose you like and display it for all to see!
name: Nendoroid Professor Leonardo (れおなるどはかせ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 蛙男商会/DLE

subtitle: A man's world that anyone would yearn for. Even better with a di:stage included!
description: From 'Golgo 13', a manga and anime series that began back in the 1960s, comes a figma of the professional assassin, Duke Togo.
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for the suit, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Poses of him aiming his rifle can easily be taken using the joints placed in the neck.
Two weapons are included - the well-known M16 as well as the 38-caliber revolver. The M16 can also be separated and stored in the included attache case.
In addition to the normal face, a grinning face with clenched teeth is included.
Various hand parts are included, including a hand to hold his cigar, as well as hands to hold his weapons in various ways.

In addition to the normal figma stand, the new generation display base 'di:stage: Basic Set' will be sold together with Golgo 13. A paper vignette in the image of a motel and speech bubbles are also included to really recreate the unique world of Golgo 13.
name: figma Golgo 13 (ごるごさーてぃん ふぃぐま)
copyright: © さいとう・たかを／さいとう・プロ／リイド社

subtitle: Repent for just 100yen, it's Zange-chan!
description: Following in her sister's footsteps, the beautiful Zange-chan from the popular "Kannagi", is also on her way as a 1/8 scale PVC figure. Also a goddess, Zange-chan inhabits the body of the shy Hakua Suzushiro, and even has a fanclub created around her as a 'local idol'.

Similar to Nagi, Zange-chan has been sculpted using the illustration from the front cover of the second volume of the manga as a basis. As she stares up from her seated pose, her beautiful legs and charming stare are bound to mezmerize whoever gazes in her direction.
name: Zange-chan (ざんげちゃん)
copyright: © 武梨えり/一迅社

subtitle: Two adorable heroines as 1/24th scale decals.
description: Nitroplus' popular game 'Demonbane' has made its way to join the GSR Character Customize Series!

Decals focusing on two of the heroines - the original Necronomicon 'Al Azif' and the mysterious girl 'Another Blood' - as well as various symbols and signs from the Demonbane are all included. Additionally, the 'Nendoroid' logo and 'Nitroplus 10th Anniversary' logo are included as extra decals, allowing for even more fun, and the perfect decoration of any plastic model.
The decals make use of a high quality material, that does not allow the colors to fade easily.
name: GSR Character Customize Series 06: Demonbane - 1/24th Scale Decals (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる06／きしんひしょうでもんべいん)
copyright: © 2006-2009 Nitroplus

subtitle: The Flame-Haired Red-Eyes Customization. Decals for 1/24th scale use.
description: The popular series 'Shakugan no Shana' has joined the GSR Character Customize Series!

Focusing on the crimson haired heroine, 'Shana', various decals making use of flames, symbols from the anime's world are all included allowing you to give an air of Shana's world to any plastic model - or anything else you want to use them on. Various extra decals such as the 'figma' and 'Nendoroid' logos are also included as extras.
The decals make use of a high quality material, that does not allow the colors to fade easily.

description: Konata Izumi from the popular 'Lucky Star' series is here once again, this time wearing her summer uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for the uniform and skirt, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
Various hand parts are included, also with all new hands such as a hand for holding items and the 'thumbs-up' hand.

A "＝ω＝" expression ideal for Konata is included, as well as the expression from the opening theme when she shouts 'dadada'. A blank face with stickers is also included for you to make your own expression.
A head part for Konata's younger cousin Yutaka Kobayakawa is included, as well as a bag to carry all Konata's otaku purchases.
As always, all the face parts can be used with all the previous Lucky Star figmas.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

description: Now available for pre-order from NicoNico Chyokuhan! (http:niconico.qt.shopserve.jp/)

That body... that appearance... they truly are mystical. The well-known idol from NicoNico Douga, the "underwear wresting aniki", Billy Herrington is back with a special 'Birthday ver.' to coincide with his birthday!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various wrestling scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for his breast muscles and biceps, allowing the proportions of his beautiful body to be kept, without compromising the posability.
The first figma to bare his naked body, allowing for even more thriving poses!
This new version includes a bondage costume to add yet another side to Billy's figma.

His underwear is identical to that which appeared in his videos, and there are two variations to switch between, or worn together at the same time. A skin-colored pair is also included for an even more naked appearance.

subtitle: Expand more; play more - the new generation display base 'di:stage' is here, starting with a basic design.
description: In order to increase the enjoyment of the figma action figure series, this new generation display unit known as the 'di:stage' has been created. It will soon expand into a series with nearly infinite possibilities, but this is the basic foundation set.
** The examples of the built set in the included images includes multiple basic sets. ** The actual figma models, as well as speech bubbles are not included with this product.
features: The base unit is a 10cm square, and the perfect way to display two figmas together.
Multiple base units can be connected horizontally via flat joints, or vertically via wall joints, allowing the stage to expand however you want it to.
A grappling unit that can be used to hold virtually any action figure is included.
Effect clips can be used to hold speech bubbles and show emotions of the characters.

Using the 'binders' that can be attached to all sides of the base, you can create a background using paper vignettes, or cover the base with a cover skin. This allows you to recreate various situations to enjoy. Paper vignettes and cover skins will be available for download online, and are planned to be available in magazines.
You can combine this with future extention sets to create your very own scenarios.
name: di:stage: Basic Set (でぃすてーじ べーしっくせっと)

subtitle: A special version of the cute electronic songstress.
description: From the ever-popular "Character Vocal Series 01: Miku Hatsune" comes this 1/8 scale PVC figure of Miku Hatsune that featured in a commercial for Good Smile Company. In this special version, Miku has her eyes closed, enthralled by the 'First Morning' commercial - and with the altered expression, she has an all new calming feel to her.
The new Miku will be sold at a special price to thank everyone who has been enjoying the Miku Hatsune series of figures!
name: Miku Hatsune: Commercial ver. (はつねみく しーえむばーじょん)

Additionally, her outfit is coated with a more metallic paint, giving her a glittering appearance as she appears on stage for her fans. If you are joining the festivities at the WonderFest be sure to grab one!

subtitle: The rosary's seal has been released.
description: From the popular anime Rosario and Vampire (also being serialized in JUMP SQ) comes a PVC figure of the vampire heroine of the show, Moka Akashiya, in her awakened state. It's the very first figure of Moka's dark side!

The position and costume used for the figure is based on the cover image of the third volume of the Rosario and Vampire manga. She is grasping her rosary in one hand with a sly smile, presenting a beautiful yet mysterious charm. Her long legs stretch out from her mini-skirt are given double the charm by the mirror based stand that she sits upon, and are bound to entrance anyone with their beauty. The chain is made from metal, allowing for a different feel to the normal PVC and ABS figures.

subtitle: Do not dishonor mankind!!
description: From the popular PC game Muv-Luv Alternative, comes a figma of Meiya Mitsurugi in her UN Army armour!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Her characteristic armour has been faithfully recreated to match the original, with various areas make use of a flexible plastic allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
'Minarukamui', her symbolic sword is included, and can be sheathed and removed from her scabbard.
Other than her default expression, an additional shouting expression is included to recreate Meiya's gallant fighing image.
Hand parts allowing her to weild her sword are included, as well as various other hand parts, coming to a total of four hand parts for each hand.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.

description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes a figma of one of Hayate Yagami's knights and the leader of the Wolkenritter, Signum!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used around moveable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.

Her armed device, Laevatein comes in 3 different forms. 'Schwertform', a sword surrounded in flames, 'Schlangenform', a whip form in which each piece is connected by a wire for posability, and 'Bogenform' as a longbow.
Two face parts that both represent Signum's loyal personality are included.
Hands used to hold onto specific parts of the weapons, hold the arrows or scabbard are all included, allowing for more gallant poses.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.

Various scenes can be recreated with Priecia's Nendoroid - from her flashy action poses to her most adorable expressions. The cute sculpting of the Nendoroid series remains as always, but this time the fine details on her ornate ornaments, as well as her vivid coloring cause her to draw attention to any figure collection. The miniature Kagura that featured in the official illustration is also included.

Two replaceable face parts are included, one to bring out Zange-chan's malicious expression, and another one for her 'blank' expression. It also wouldn't be Zange-chan without her 'One Time for 100 Yen' sign, as well as two impurities that she can place in her hands. Displaying her togther with her sister will complete the twins in one of their most adorable forms yet!
name: Nendoroid Zange-chan (ざんげちゃん ねんどろいど)

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various wrestling scenes.

description: The forth charm in the Fate/Stay Night Metal Charm collection is the Azoth sword used by Rin Tohsaka.

Both the sword itself and the gem that stored magical energy are being sold together as a single set, allowing you to fully enjoy the contrast between the dull light shining off the sword, and the deep crimson gem.

Combine the two sets together and recreate any of the performances that you liked from the game!

She has been sculpted based on a key visual from the anime, standing in a dynamic pose fulled with energy that pulls out her personality perfectly. The Imo-chan figure that is included with the simultaneously released "Nendoroid Imoko Shishido Maidroid Ver." can be displayed together with Akiha to complete the rendition of the duo.

description: The Nishimura Collection continues following the popular Mai Shiranui figure released in 2007. This time it's a PVC figure of Morigan, the popular character from "Vampire Savior - The Lord of Vampire".

She has been sculpted holding her hair up while staring ahead with a compelling gaze, with a sensual pose perfectly suited to her appealing succubus body. The sculptor, Takeshi Hamasaki has given his best to sculpt this charming 1/6 scale figure for all to enjoy.

series: Vampire Savior: The Lord of Vampire

description: From the maniac shooter game of long standing fame, "Mushihime-sama Futari" comes a 1/7 scale PVC figure of the deity of "Shunshu ga Mori", who is also the main character of the game, Reco!

She has an innocent smiling face suited to her personality, but in contrast are her bold, eye-catching proportions. The gentle princess will make you feel loved with this charmingly sculpted figure, positioned in a nicely balanced supple position. Her most well known feature - her long pigtails - are made from a clear plastic, but still keep a brilliantly vivid color. Careful detail has been added to areas such as her brooch and belt, making even the smallest areas a pleasure to look at.

copyright: © 2006 CAVE CO.,LTD.

The wet type is soaked in chemicals that make it very difficult to dry out - perfect for removing wrinkles, or applying decals. The large and small dry types have tipped ends, which are perfect for placing intricate parts of decals down, or removing paints from tools after use. 10 wet swabs, 40 large dry swabs and 25 small dry swabs are included, for a total of 75 swabs.

Pick the right tools for the job! High quality model construction requires high quality tools! The 'GSR Modeler Support Series' is a set of tools for model construction that has been created using both the ideas and experience of GSR's professional modelers. Defects and unreliable tools from the past have been corrected, creating easy-to-use, reliable tools of the highest quality. From beginners to experts, the GSR Modeler Support Series will cater to all!

A single set versatile in multiple ways.

In sharp contrast to their normal personalities, the girls are posed wearing flowing kimonos in a rather erotic pose, pushing the yuri factor for this figure super high! You can even see their detailed knee socks through the opening between the kimonos!

Kyouka stands with her cat ears and tail, looking like a young girl even though she claims to be 20 years old. Making use of her fervent character, she is placed in a pose that truly makes her look like an omnipotent deity. Two of the mini-Kyokas that bustled around in the opening theme of the series have also been included in a cute Nendoroid petite form, each with different expressions.

It's the first Nendoroid to have an interior design! - just as it appeared in the anime, the hair can open to reveal a small opening for Imo-chan to stick her helmeted head out. Imo-chan also comes with an additional face part, as well as a body part to recreate her uniform appearance. Akiha Shishido's PVC figure will be released at the same time, allowing you to display them together.

description: In episode 12 of The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi, "Live Alive" Tsuruya-san dressed in this cute maid outfit for the the café her class was running during the culture festival. Now a figma of Tsuruya-san in that cute maid uniform is on its way!
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her shoulder area, her apron and parts of her hair, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability.
Face parts to recreate the "Yuki Puppet" scene, as well as the winking pose from the opening theme are included. The faces can be exchanged with the School Uniform ver.
Various extras such as a lantern, yakisoba and a filled paper cup are all included to recreate the scenes at the festival. The hand parts for the puppet scene are also included.
As a bonus part, a new hair part for Mikuru is included, which you to attach to the original Mikuru's head parts, allowing you to create Mikuru's maid figma as well.

subtitle: Incredible technique, masked by an expressionless face.
description: The third in Max Factory's "Haruhi Suzumiya's Extravaganza" series! Finally Yuki Nagato is here to join the collection, dressed in a punk style costume whilst clinging to her guitar.

Based on the original illustration, this dynamic, open figure is topped full with Yuki's subtle charm. Everything from her boots, chain belt, guitar, the leather jacket made to feel as it should – they're all packed with secret hidden details! You can also peek at her cute belly area in between the gap of her trousers and shirt - the contrast between her clothes and skin is one of the many highlights of the figure.

Yuki was once again sculpted by Masanori Kuroda, and with her release the set of heroines has come to a close – if you display her together with the other two in the series, Mikuru Asahina and Suzumiya Haruhi, you can create a collection that truly stands out in any collection!

description: Once again allowing you to customize your car or bike in the easiest way possible! The popular virtual idols Rin and Len Kagamine are here to join the Good Smile Racing sticker series.

The well-known official illustration is included as a massive 36cm sticker, along with 35 other smaller stickers - a huge A3 page of stickers to stick wherever you want, and decorate whatever you want!
The seals are made in Japan and make use of a high quality material, that doesn't allow the colors to fade easily.

subtitle: The little cupid, perfectly poseable.♥
description: Following the "Yuki Nagato Evil Witch Ver." comes another figma from The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Episode 0: "Mikuru Asahina's Adventures" - this time being Mikuru herself, dressed up in her Fighting Waitress uniform.
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her shoulder area, the skirt and the apron, allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising the posability.

Two face parts are included, one to recreate the Mikuru Beam scene, and the other of a winking face as if she was saying her well-known phrase "Confidential Information". The faces can be switched with both the School Uniform ver. and the Cheerleader ver.
Two model guns, and new hand parts to recreate the Mikuru Beam pose are included.
As bonus parts, a new face for the figma Kyon School Uniform ver., as well as the reindeer head that appeared in the ending theme are included.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.

subtitle: Transformed by magic, it's Kagami in Miku's outfit!
description: It's an image of Kagami that has been popular ever since the cover illustration from the Lucky Star OVA was released, and now it's coming as a Nendoroid -it's Kagami as she appeared within her dream, cosplaying as Miku Hatsune!

She comes complete with the two leeks that featured on the OVA's cover, as well as various expressions that show exactly how awkward she feels about cosplaying. She even comes with the popular expression that she made as she said, "I want to ******", as she woke from her dream.
The body of the Nendoroid is based on Kagami's body shape, and is thus a completely new mould.

Everything from her unique costume and hairstyle have all been converted into nendoroid form, but kept true to their originals. She has various expressions that you can use to recreate all sorts of scenes with, and the magical baton she uses to cleanse the impurities of the world is also included.

She can be posed ready to fire her bow whilst gazing ahead at her target, or you can pose her drawing her spirit sword, which is easily one of the most memorable scenes from the game. Both the Yudzuka spirit sword and the Nichirin Resshin spirit sword scenes can be recreated with the included parts, so you can display her using whichever technique best suits the situation.

subtitle: The figma has transformed too! It's a Mikkumiku collaboration!

The figure is a new sculpt to match Kagami's body shape. Parts of the body use the same metallic coloring used on the Miku Hatsune figma.
Two of the "must have" leeks are included, made to look just as they did in the OVA.

subtitle: She may look cute... but she's actually a dangerous weapon!
description: From the popular manga currently being serialized in Weekly Shounen JUMP, “To LOVE-Ru”, comes the most revered assassin in the universe, Golden Darkness.

The figure was based on a design that was illustrated for the anime version of the series. She is posed in mid-motion whilst daintily balancing on her toes. The motion of her body, her hair, even the fine details of the creases in her clothes have been carefully sculpted. Her right arm can be replaced with a dangerous blade to better suit her assassin's nature.
She has been designed to pair up with the previously released Lala figure, so you can double the impact by displaying them together.
name: Golden Darkness (こんじきのやみ)
copyright: © 矢吹健太朗・長谷見沙貴／集英社・とらぶる製作委員会

subtitle: Even in a band she makes the perfect mascot!

Following the recently announced Haruhi figure comes this Mikuru Asahina figure in a beautiful flowing dress; also based on the same promotion illustration used for the live event "The Extravaganza of Haruhi Suzumiya".

Once again sculpted by Masanori Kuroda, she is posed with a beaming smile whist happily playing her tambourine - a pose that truly makes the figure feel like Mikuru herself. She is wearing a pink dress filled with fluttering frills, which only serves to increase her cuteness even more! Every part of her costume has been carefully sculpted to bring out as much of Mikuru's charm as possible!
name: Mikuru Asahina Extravaganza Ver. (あさひなみくる げきそうばーじょん)
copyright: © 2006 谷川流・いとうのいぢ/SOS団　　　※画像は監修中のものです。

subtitle: Listen to the cries of my heart!!

Masanori Kuroda, the expert sculptor who worked on the original school uniform version of Haruhi, has taken the original image and added a dynamic, liberated feeling to the figure - creating a figure just as charming as the original illustration. Her voluminous skirt as well as all the tiny frills on her costume have all had careful attention paid to the finest of details, and the elaborately designed guitar she holds is yet another highlight of the figure.
Her vibrant facial expression truly brings out the confidence that Haruhi has always held true to - bringing out a lively figure fit for this worldwide idol.
name: Haruhi Suzumiya Extravaganza Ver. (すずみやはるひ げきそうばーじょん)

Every fine detail from the original illustration has been beautifully sculpted into the figure - from her proportions, her facial expression and her radiant skin to her fingertips that seem ready to fire her gun at any moment. As an additional extra, a special card of the original illustration is included.
name: JULIONA TRANS (じゅりあな とらんす)
series: Masamune Shirow Character Series Vol 1: Wild Wet West

A separate set of the three heroines of Lucky Star will each be sold in the following regions: Hokkaido, the Kantou region, Akihabara, The Hokuriki/Shinetsu/Toukai region, the Kinki region and the Chuugoku/Shigoku/Kyuushuu region.

Each of the different regions have their own specific three charms - one for each of the main characters, but each time wearing cosplay outfits that represent something that relates to the area they are being sold in. Each charm is a creative rendition of your favorite characters, and if you collect them from every region there are a total of 18 mascots to collect!

The super cute goth-loli yukata that she wore in episode 4 of the series, "Meeting Beneath the Night Sky", has been faithfully reproduced. From her long, characteristic hair flowing around her, to the detailed goth-loli yukata that truly brings out her cute appeal.

As the glutton she is, she holds a super sized rice ball in her hands. Her helmet and armor can both be removed and reattached, so whenever you want to you can gaze at her world class proportions that would normally never be so easily visible. The included sword can be sheathed in her scabbard.

Sculpted in its combat form, the shining dagger has been released attached to the long, winding chain seen in the series. A motif of her master's command spell is also included, all coming together as another superb charm to add to the collection.

description: Answering the pleas of the fans comes a figure of Shiki Ryougi, the heroine from the movie series that is currently a huge hit in Japan, "Kara no Kyoukai"! Dressed in her signature kimono along with a leather jacket worn over the top, she wields her knife which kills anything that stands before her. subtitle: This is where everything started! The original figma, Juohmaru!
description: Plawres Sanshiro is a manga that began in the 80's which quickly received an anime adaption. Even now it still holds popularity with its many fans, and now a figma of the PlaWrestler Juohmaru is on its way!

The figma project was originally created as a joint effort between Masaki Asai and Max Factory using these figures as concept models - and now that we have reached the first year anniversary of figma, what better a time could there be to release the two figures that started the figma legend?

subtitle: Even as a nendoroid, her body is as perfect as ever!

She also comes with additional head and hand parts, allowing for a countless number of posing possibilities. You can pose her ready to fire her rifle, or you can switch to a completely different side of Yoko, posing her in a shy, embarrassed position. name: Nendoroid Yoko (よーこ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © GAINAX・中島かずき/アニプレックス・KDE-J・テレビ東京・電通

subtitle: High quality official Muv-Luv stickers for real cars!
description: Large stickers used for customizing cars or motorbikes. Popular characters such as Meiya Mitsurugi, Haruhi Mitsurugi, Yuuko Kouduki and Marimo Jinguuji have all had their character designs included, creating a total of 11 stickers on a single sheet.

The longest of the character stickers reaches approximately 21cm, and the Valkyrie Brigade's insignia from Muv-Luv Alternative is also included, which stretches 11cm from top to bottom. The stickers are made in Japan using a high quality material that won't fade easily!
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Muv-Luv - Big Sticker Set 02 (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず びっぐさいず すてっかー02／マブラヴ)
copyright: © 2008 âge All rights reserved.

subtitle: Muv-Luv stickers that can be used on scale cars, cellphones... even real cars!
description: This sticker set featuring the characters from Muv-Luv can be used on a multitude of things - from 1/18th scale cars, to real cars, cellphones, computers - the potential uses are limitless!

These seals are based on the images used on the official âge Lamborghini Gallardo and the Lancia Stratos itasha, and fill two large A3 sheets, meaning there are more than enough stickers to use wherever you need. Muv-Luv Alternative's popular Valkyrie Brigade insignia is also included. Made in Japan using a high quality material that won't fade easily!
name: GSR Character Customize Series: Muv-Luv - 1/18 Scale Seals 02 (ぐっどすまいるれーしんぐ きゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず しーるせっと02／マブラヴ 1/18すけーるよう)
copyright: © 2008 âge All rights reserved.

subtitle: The only one who can complete the tag team is her! figma Sakura Hime!
description: Plawres Sanshiro is a manga that began in the 80's which quickly received an anime adaption. Even now it still holds popularity with its many fans, and along with figma Juohmaru comes a figma to partner with him, Sakura Hime!

The figma project was originally created as a joint effort between Masaki Asai and Max Factory using these figures as concept models - and now that we have reached the first year anniversary of figma, what better a time could there be to release the two figures that started the figma legend?
features: The original concept model behind the creation of the figma series of figures.
Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Her nimble, flexible body has been faithfully recreated, allowing many poses that show her true charm.
A flexible plastic was used between the legs, making sure that proportions were kept, without compromising the posability.
Three faces are included, including an expressionless face, and various hand parts are also included allowing for a virtually unlimited number of poses.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma Sakura Hime (Original Edition): JPWA Tag Tournament ver. (ふぃぐま さくらひめ（げんさくばん） JPWAたっぐとーなめんとver. )
copyright: © 牛次郎・神矢みのる・秋田書店2009

subtitle: The dignified king of knights, who always keeps her distant dream in her heart, and now...
description: Finally a PVC product line has started from the new figure makers, Gift! The first figure to be released is the ultimate servant, Saber, from "Fate/Stay Night". The beautiful sculpting work has been done by Satoshi Toda, and he has created a figure that not only shows Saber's vigor as the king of knights, but also shows her delicacy. As a special first production extra, head parts sculpted by Ikuma Kuramoto (Millimeter Models) will be included. Don't miss out on this otherwise impossible collaboration!
name: Saber (せいばー)
copyright: © TYPE-MOON

subtitle: The long-awaited third figure in the Muv-Luv series!
description: From the PC game with thousands of fanatical fans "Muv-Luv Alternative" comes a PVC figure of the main heroine, Sumika Kagami! She is wearing the reinforced suit that she wears while riding the Susanoo 4th Model. She's holding a heart as a personal motif of her energetic, cheerful personality, which has been captured beautifully in this figure. The carefully sculpted base can be connected to the other three bases in the series.
name: Sumika Kagami (かがみ すみか)
copyright: © 2008 âge All rights reserved.

subtitle: Sculpted with all the charm from the illustration!!
description: The second in the set of figures based on original illustrations drawn by the popular artist Shunya Yamashita, just for the LILICS series of figures! Sculpted in a unique pose, while holding a huge sword, leaves this figure with both an artistic and sensual feel. Two of Shunya Yamashita's specialties - cute eyes and a mature body have both been wonderfully sculpted into this figure. Her costume makes use of a design which creates a beautiful blend of science fiction and fantasy elements. Enjoy the originality and skill behind the LILICS series!
name: Nasca (なすか)
copyright: © 山下しゅんや

subtitle: A cute girl with a massive weapon!!
description: A figure based on the original character drawn by famous manga artist Mine Yoshizaki. She is sculpted in a cute costume that brings out her bodyline, with an overwhelmingly huge weapon that looks far too big for her. She has large eyes and a vivid collar, which are both some of Mine Yoshizaki's specialities. She was sculpted by G.O from the popular Cerberus Project.
name: Limit Gunz (りみっとがんつ)
copyright: © 吉崎観音/マッグガーデン

subtitle: To avenge the death of his friend!
description: Guile, a major in the United States Air Force, has joined the Revolech SFO collection!
Combining his skills in various martial arts with his techniques as a professional wrestler, Guile formed his own personal fighting style - which can now be recreated using Revoltech joints.
Collect the rest of the figures that are due to come out in this series, and you can keep your favorite characters both by your side and in the game!
name: Revoltech SFO Guile (SFO がいる りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: The iron trooper, here to open the path to the future!
description: A new addition to the 35MAX series has been announced - another figure from "Armored Trooper VOTOMS: Commander Vorct", an original story which is currently being serialized in Hobby Japan magazine. This time we see the Scopedog Assault, a freshly designed mech ridden by the main character, Captain Rane. A turbo unit is included to recreate motion scenes, and pile bunkers can be attached to various parts of the mech using electromagnets. The head parts that were used during underwater exploration are also included. This perfection is truly suited to the strongest of the ATs!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES CV-05: Commando Vorct Scopedog Assasult - Rane Custom (あさるとれーんかすたむ こまんどふぉーくと)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Yagi Atsushi)
copyright: © サンライズ

subtitle: A master of the sword, revered by men across the world.
description: An original character from Street Fighter Online, based on a character from the Chinese novel "The Smiling, Proud Wanderer" written by Jinyong. Reikochuu has been added to the SFO Revoltech Collection! With an unbeatable skill in swordplay, Reikochuu is a user of the Dugu Nine Swords, but is also a do-gooder and a cheerful drinker.
Using the separate parts of each of the characters in the series, you can create your own original characters. Link the games with the figures and get that K.O.!
name: Revoltech SFO Reikochuu (SFO れいこちゅう りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: What's that coming into view? A lot of bare skin... and a pumpkin!
description: Following the release of Chuchu Astram from the popular PC game "Chu X Chu Idol" comes the kind-hearted manager, Pixie Hiyori! Although she normally has a very calm, relaxed personality, these clothes from the demon world definitely give her a much more provocative appearance! The pumpkin hat on her head is also a charming addition to her costume. Not to mention that both that costume and the pumpkin can be removed, allowing you to display an even sexier Hiyori whenever you want!
name: Pixie Hiyori (ひより・ぴくしー)
copyright: © 2006,2007 ユニゾンシフト /SOFTPAL Inc.

subtitle: Pressing even further into the battle!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the seventh figure set in the new "Battle Soldiers" series as a part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series. The battle between the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side" has just become even more devastating than before. Each of the figures in the series are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Even more fun will open up to you once you've collected the whole set of warriors!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS 7 (ばとるそるじゃーず だい７だん)
copyright: © アトリエ彩

subtitle: Good wife! Dictator! Scary wife! Nendoroid Kyouka Midarezaki!
description: From the popular anime "Kyouran Kazoku Nikki", comes a nendoroid of the Midarezaki family's mother, Kyouka Midarezaki! At first glance she looks like a little girl with cat ears and a tail, but she actually claims that she is 20 years old! Her egotistical presence has been faithfully recreated in this figure, whilst also keeping her cute appearance in mind. Three face parts are included, and the third daughter of the Midarezaki family, Gekka Midarezaki is also included!
name: Nendoroid Kyouka Midarezaki (みだれざき きょうか)
series: Kyouran Kazoku Nikki (Diary of a Crazed Family)
copyright: © 2008 Akira／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN,INC.／超常現象対策局分室

subtitle: The final master of the Book of Darkness, figma Hayate Yagami - Set Up!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes a figma of the commanding officer of Riot Force 6 - Hayate Yagami, wearing her knight armour.
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes
One of the two face parts included has been sculpted to depict Hayate's truly determined expression.
Her armed device "Schwertkruez" is included, as well as the "Book of Darkness" which can be held both open, and closed.
The feathers on her back are made from a clear plastic, and along with her hat can be removed, allowing for even more poses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hayate Yagami: Knight Armour ver. (ふぃぐま やがみはやて きしかっちゅうver.)
copyright: © なのはStrikerS PROJECT

subtitle: The cute mermaid walking down the path of chivalry - figma San Seto!
description: From the anime "Seto no Hanayome" comes a figma of the profound and proud heroine San Seto, wearing her Isono 8th Junior High school uniform!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for her uniform and skirt, making sure that proportions were kept, without compromising the posability.
Interchangeable parts are included to recreate her mermaid transformation that occurs when she gets wet.
A long yakuza sword is included along with a scabbard that it can be sheathed in. The catears from episode 20 are also included.
Face parts allowing for either a smiling face or a cold glare are included; as well as various hand parts, including one used to hold the sword.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
name: figma San Seto (せとさん ふぃぐま)
copyright: © 木村太彦/スクウェアエニックス･瀬戸内魚類協同組合

subtitle: The perfect new year's gift for that special person... or just for yourself.
description: The cute girls from Lucky Star are back again in Nendoroid Petiteform, this time wearing beautiful miko dresses to celebrate the New Year! Each of the girls comes with a little personal extra, such as a wooden plaque offering, or a paper fortune. Even the stands are made to look like a paved path that would be found at a New Year's festival, making it the perfect item to celebrate the new year!
4 Nendoroid Petites, a papercraft torii gate, and 6 re-usable stickers for the plaque offerings are all included in this "Happy New Year" set!!
Reservations start November 1st 2008 (Saturday) from 9am at Tokimeki Mall, Circle K and SUNKUS stores (excluding certain stores)
name: Nendoroid Petite: Lucky Star New Year Set (らきすた おねんがせっと ねんどろいど ぷち)
copyright: © 美水かがみ／らっきー☆ぱらだいす

subtitle: She may be small... but this a still a huge figure!
description: With the new OVA's release date decided, the Kodomo no Jikan anime stays ever popular. Now a new figure of the elementary school heroine Rin Kokonoe is here - and this time she's in her gym uniform.

She has been sculpted as an incredible 1/4 scale figure, with her uniform and bloomers made entirely from cloth for a truly realistic recreation. She sits and gazes ahead in her uniform, with a slightly erotic appeal that you would never expect from an elementary student. The stand looks as if it is a gymnastics mat, adding even more feeling of the figure.
name: Rin Kokonoe: Gym Uniform ver. (ここのえりん たいそうふくばーじょん)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル／こどものじかん製作委員会
